name: CourseTopics
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new course topic record

Request payload must contain the following fields:

coures_module_id : STRING,
topic_type_id: STRING,
topic_type: STRING,
title: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/courseTopics

raw 
  {
    "course_module_id": "1",
    "topic_type_id": "1",
    "topic_type":"VIDEO",
    "title":"Video 1"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-15T03:07:36.117Z","updated_at":"2022-09-15T03:07:36.117Z","status":"ACTIVE","course_topic_id":68,"course_module_id":"1","topic_type_id":"1","topic_type":"VIDEO","title":"Video 1","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
